Summary: Rectagular, rotating lights all around, blinking light on top & bottom, steel girder like legs.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lanham-Seabrook
There were no other sightings in Lanham-Seabrook on or around September 19th 1975
divs: sighting detailsnoticed rectangular light in sky as i was driving on washington beltway toward ardmoor rd. saw this light 3 different times in 3 different places. thought at first it was an airplane. afterthought a ufo, but laughed it off in my mind. i drove down ardmoor\ardwick road heading east(which was a secluded country road at that time). when i reached the end to turn right (head south) onto lottsford\vista road i looked up and saw a rectagular craft hovering over the tree tops, which was to my left (driver's side of car). hovering over the treetops at the enterprise golf course. it was the size of a football field. lights were rotating around the rectagular craft and there was a blinking light on top and one of the bottom blinking simultaeously. i had my 5 year son with me at the time and asked him if he was seeing the same thing as i. to this day he remembers it. i heard no engine sounds as my car window was open because i reached my head out to get a better look. my son said he saw figures looking out of a window, i did not see them. as i began to move forward the craft began to move with me and it was at that time i began to panic and drive faster. the road led under a tunnel of trees and when i reached that point the craft swiftly and quietly disappeared in a matter of seconds over the trees. at the time my boyfriend subscribed to the nicap newsletter. when he received the september issue it has an article in it that stated 2 other people spotted the same craft and i did that same night in p.g. county. i would like to know if you still have that article? additionally, the next day i called andrews afb and asked about the project blue book that i wanted to report seeing a strange craft and they said they no longer accepted ufo calls and that the project blue book was closed. i asked if they had such an aircraft that could hover and they said yes they did, however they did not describe the same as the one i saw.
